Performances > November 1993: Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy

November 1993: Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy

Plays:

Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy (菅原伝授手習鑑)

Scenes:

The Enrollment (寺入り)

The Village School (寺子屋)
